fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: -Check someone to see if they’re a Criminal

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Criminals are any role within the Criminal faction
-This role may not spawn if the Criminals are not present
-When you find a criminal, you will throw them into your prison
-You have a night chat with all of your prisoners, at once. You will appear to be a Cop when you talk.
-Criminals in your jail won’t be able to interact or be interacted with at night.
-If you have all criminals in your prison, publicly announce each one of them. Then, hang them all at once. This uses the daily hanging for 2 days (unless there is only 1 or 2 criminals, in which case it will only use that day’s hanging) but the day will continue as normal or until day is skipped.
-When all criminals die, become a random town killing role. I don’t care. It’s up to the host I guess

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all criminals then complete your town’s wincon
